verses.roman:
ataeva adhīśvara tumi sarva pitā
tomāra śaktite tāṅrā jagat-rakṣitā

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; adhīśvara—primeval Lord; tumi—You; sarva—of all; pitā—father; tomāra—Your; śaktite—by the energy; tāṅrā—They; jagat—of the cosmic creations; rakṣitā—protectors.
translation: "Therefore You are the primeval Lord, the original father of everyone. They [the puruṣas] are protectors of the universes by Your power.
